General.Name: Nextgen
General.Description: Nextgen Biomed Ltd develops topical treatment for psoriasis. The company was formerly known as Sela Group.Com Ltd. and changed its name to Nextgen Biomed Ltd in February 2010. Nextgen Biomed Ltd was incorporated in 1990 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.
